name: SkillMint
description: SkillMint is a decentralized platform built on the Cardano blockchain that empowers users to build reputations through provable skills and verified challenges. It combines the proof-of-work concept with a challenge-based learning model, leveraging blockchain security, expert validation, and AI voice recognition to ensure authenticity. How it Works, Users connects their wallets, choose a challenge, Submits their work, get verified and earn rewards. SkillMint is designed to be a comprehensive solution for skill verification, offering a transparent, secure, and user-friendly experience.
